subject: Amazon order not delivered completely
description_text:
Hi Simsonn Support,

i ordered the SIMSONN Plus X "BLACK-P2-H2-Plate" which means Brake and
Throttle with baseplate on the 02.12 via Amazon.

A package arrived today, but I noticed that it only contained the two
pedals, without the baseplate and heelplate.

My Amazon order number is 306-1184090-0857104.
The order is shown as completed on the Amazon website.

The tracking number I received from Amazon also only shows one package,
which arrived today as mentioned above.

Has something gone wrong here? Will I still receive the baseplate?

Kind regards,
David Mioska
